name: APIVoid
description: Provides information on whether a domain or IP is present in any of the block lists tracked by the APIVoid IP and Domain reputation services.

options.name: APIVoid URL
options.description: The base URL for the APIVoid API including the schema.

options.name: View Blocklisted Indicators Only
options.description: If checked, only indicators with at least 1 blocklist engine detection will be returned to the Polarity Overlay.
